text: J. T. Petty (born 28 February 1977 in Raleigh, North Carolina) is an American filmmaker and video game writer. Petty's film and short novels contain elements of the horror genre. He wrote the Ubisoft video game, Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell as well as the survival horror games Outlast and Outlast 2.
